parameters.label: Variable
parameters.infoText: The name of the variable to change.

parameters.label: Value
parameters.infoText: The value to change the variable to.

parameters.label: Operation
parameters.infoText: How the variable should be affected by the value.

parameters.label: Time (Seconds)
parameters.infoText: How long the tween will take.

parameters.label: Ease
parameters.infoText: The type of transition to use for the tween.
